entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
PATCHY FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH THIS EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

PARTLY SUNNY
PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS AROUND 70
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 70
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S

SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 90
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
